basics.name: Chen Chun-Hsien
basics.label: Professor
basics.summary: Professor at School of Mechanical & Aerospace Engineering, NTU. Research focuses on design science in product design and development, engineering/design informatics for managing/supporting digital design & manufacturing, and human factors and management of human performance. World's Top 2% Scientists (2022-2024) by Stanford University.
